title: Hello Hexo
content:
Welcome to my blog by Hexo! If you want to have your own blog space, this article will teach it.
Quick Start1.安装Hexo$ npm install hexo-cli -g

2.初始化博客$ hexo init blog

3.安装keep主题$ cd blog$ npm install hexo-theme-keep$ npm update hexo-theme-keep // 更新主题

4.配置主题node_modules/hexo-theme-keep/_config.yml
https://keep-docs.xpoet.cn/usage-tutorial/configuration-guide.html#base-info
5.插件5.1搜索插件
More info: Search$ npm install hexo-generator-searchdb// 在 Hexo 配置文件 _config.yml 里添加如下配置search:  path: search.json  field: post  content: true  format: striptags

5.2评论插件Gitalk
More info: Gitalk  

6.创建文章$ hexo new "Hello Hexo"
7.启动服务预览$ hexo server

8.生成静态文件$ hexo clean$ hexo generate

9.提交GitHub Pages$ git commit



[参考链接]:https://keep-docs.xpoet.cn/usage-tutorial/configuration-guide.html#base-inf
https://easyhexo.com
https://github.com/hexojs/hexo
https://keep-docs.xpoet.cn
https://github.com/XPoet/hexo-theme-keep
